0.1.name: wordpress/sonicblink
0.1.description:
By integrating our system with major social media platforms we make it easy for users to share, bookmark and tag content.

The data is used to find people with similar interests who will want that same content.

If someone visits a website and likes an article, not only will it be publicly posted on their stream, it will also be emailed directly to users who have been matched with similar interests.

<

p>For more information check out http://www.sonicblink.com/
